column4: any1 here ever had install issues with ubuntu? Mine hangs on Select and install software at 6%. dvd drive is still spinning the cd, light on the drive is flashing, with Please wait... on the screen :|
did you choose to partition your whole HD ? Depending on the size it could take some time ..
are you looking to dual boot , otherwise gparted might do a better job partitioning your HD before you install Ubuntu (just a thought)
look for gparted, also a live cd, real handy tool
